Muito sinceramente o jogo e completamente retardado. Ap√≥s quase 1000 horas de jogo finalmente tive a coragem de desinstalar esta pilha de bosta ambulante.
A comunidade e a mais t√≥xica que alguma vez vi e a cada dia que passa est√° cada vez pior. 
Jogar de sobrevivente e demasiado f√°cil e se jogares com outros 3 jogadores experientes, ainda mais f√°cil se torna. Jogar de assassino √© demasiado stressante. 
O balan√ßo de poder est√° completamente errado. Eu nunca senti que estivesse com o poder na m√£o como assassino, enquanto, quando jogava de sobrevivente sentia que os verdadeiros assassinos era-mos n√≥s.
Vale a pena experimentar para experimentar algo novo mas n√£o joguem exclusivamente isto. S√≥ se quiserem queimar alguns cromossomas.

Dead by daylight, oder auch kurz dbd ist zusammengefast ein 4 gegen 1 horror multiplayer spiel. Im spiel kannst du aussuchen ob du √úberlebender (Generatoren wieder zum laufen bringen "f√ºr dein Rest deines Lebens" und vom Killer entkommen) oder Killer (Alle √úberlebende t√∂ten so schnell und gut wie m√∂glich) Spielen m√∂chtest. Dann kannst du dir 4 von 113 Perks als √úberlebender und 4 von 100 Perks als Killer aussuchen. (insgesamt gibt es 213 Perks, wenn man CHAPTER 25: Resident Evil: PROJECT W mit z√§hlt.) Erstens gibt es zu viele Perks, zweitens viele Perks sind sehr √§hnlich und drittens sind ca 87% aller Perks sind oder waren nicht gut weil sie nur schwer\nur in sehr seltenen situationen zu benutzen oder n√ºtzlich sind. (wie Self-care von Claudette Morel, Sole Survivor von Laurie Strode, alle Perks von Ace Visconti und Smash Hit von Yun-Jin Lee.) die restlichen 13% sind Meta Perks, wie Sprint Burst von Meg Thomas, Dead Hard von David King und Boon: Circle of Healing von Mikaela Reid.
 Als √úberlebender kannst du noch ein Item mit dir nemen und √úberlebende und Killer haben dann noch Opfergaben die am Begin des Trails verbrannt werden. 
Wenn du Killer Spielst hast du dann entweder ein parr Survivle with Friends "die dir das leben zu H√∂lle machen und Extrem Toxic sind", oder welche die das Spiel "zum ersten mall Spielen". Als √úberlebende Hast du entweder einen "AFK" oder Noob Killer oder "Ein Red Rank 1 Killer Nurse die dich in denn ersten 2 Sekunden des spiel Opfert." 
Am ende wirst du noch mit "Salz im Chat beworfen" und dann wirst du sehen das du "trotz 2 Gens und 12 Sekunden Chase" gerade mall 9002 Blutpunkte gemacht hast. WILLKOMMEN IN DEAD BY DAYLIGHT.

(Der gr√∂√üt teil ist besser geworden und etwas davon war auch nur als ein teil Unterhaltung angesehen (markiert mit "), trotzdem w√ºrde ich das Spiel nicht weiter empfehlen da es noch viele Sachen zum verbessern gibt, wie Tunneln, Camping, Toxic Survivers, ein teil der META Perks und Combinationen von Killer Add-ons und perks die einen zur T√∂tungsmaschine machen. DAS IST ALLES NUR MEINE MEINUNG)

It's a fun game better to have a full squad to run survivor if not i usually run as a killer a lot of different maps. It can get repetitive but over all it's a fun game and you can get a lot of hours out of it.

Wow wow wow, I love Dead By Daylight so much. Only recently started playing it on PC and just the difference from console is insane. It's easily in my top 10 games of all time.

[b] GAMEPLAY [/b]
The premise and mechanics of this game is like no other that I've played, from the vast selection of characters to the objectives. I love how many perks there are to choose from, ranging from the meta perks to just the most over the top, funny perks. It's amazing to get into games where people are running perks you would never have guessed. Having the strategy of perks be almost more important than the actual killer you are running, makes each game feel tense and strategic, trying to hunt down potential hexes and looking out for signs of what perks everyone is running. 

[b] DLC [/b]
Despite having paid DLC, you can easily experience the full game for free, since you can go against any killer or be teamed with any survivor, regardless if you own them or not. However, I highly recommend buying the DLC as it is so fun to play as your favourite franchise killer or even the in-depth original characters that BHVR and the community have put so much love into. Each killer feels like a different experience playing and playing against, and with each player having unique playstyles, each game feels different and fresh. 

[b] COMMUNITY [/b]
Now... From an outsiders perspective, DBD has a toxic community, but the ammount of toxic people you actually run into are very few in comparison (although, this may just be because console players can't talk in the endgame chat lol). Even toxic players are funny in their own way; you just cant get mad at bubba facecamping you, its too cute LMAOASDKNFAKNF The community is still active and thriving even after the game being released 8 years ago, mainly due to the huge livestreaming audience DBD has. The community for the most part is mature and funny, and whilst the game may be considered killer sided, the community definitely is survivor sided LMAO 

[b] IN CONCLUSION [/b]
I can't wait for new updates and don't ever see myself stopping playing Dead By Daylight. I've met many awesome people in and out of the game, and it's truly iconic. Thank you to the community for making this game so much more than it's base game is, and thanks BHVR for nerfing survivors :)
such a slay game. u can slug all the survs who get on ur nerves and flash the killers, especially trickster <333333
This game is like having a CBT kink
I like it, but don't take it too serious. Have fun or don't play

I always find myself coming back, even after playing as
long as I have. People are unpredictable, and not knowing
what the enemy will do keeps you on your toes, and makes
you switch tactics constantly. It's pretty
hard to get bored of a game when every match is unique.

And don't even get me started with how often the devs
update the game, and add new killers and survivors to keep
it interesting. As someone who gets bored of games WAY
too easily, this is one that I could never get bored of. ‚úåÔ∏é

Started playing again after five years. Addictive and miserable.

Sinceramente, es un juego divertido, que podes jugar solo o con amigos, pero aun as√≠ da mucha verg√ºenza los servidores del juego, es incre√≠ble que te dice un ping (ms) y en la partida jugas con otro, da mucho enojo querer jugar a un juego como tal y que los servidores cada vez est√©n peor, de 10 partidas 8 son con ping alto de manera que sea hace totalmente injugable, ademas no puede ser que en el lobby te diga 30 ms y despu√©s en la partida tengas 200ms que no puedas moverte, el killer esta a 10 o mas metros tuyo, y te paga igual, osea para que se utiliza la habilidad de Loopear, si el killer te pega estando lejos tuyos, sabiendo que dicha habilidad se usa durante toda la partida. 
Estoy totalmente decepcionado por la calidad de los servidores, en vez de sacar DLC y skines, deber√≠an mejorar la calidad de los servidores.
